name: Arul Rubbers
overview:
Established in the year 1978, we Arul Rubbers Private Limited are amongst the reputed names in the industry, engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a wide array of Chemical Equipment such as Tube Sheets, Evaporators etc for Viscose & Rayon and for Other Industries. We are also service provider of Rubber Linnings.

Infrastructure: We are supported by modernized infrastructure facility that is equipped with latest technologies and advanced amenities. Our subdivision includes Manufacturing unit, Research & development wing, quality control department and Storage unit. Our units are supervised by experienced engineers and technicians. They ensure that the entire machinery parts are well-lubricated to ensure smooth flow of functioning.

Quality: Being a quality conscious firm, we ensure that we deliver flawless range of products to our clients. We ensure that the entire product range is in compliance with set quality standards and guidelines and fulfill the diverse requirements of the clients efficiently.

Our Team: Experienced and dedicated professionals are considered as the main supporting pillars of our organization. Our employees are hired after conducting the stringent recruitment policy followed by screening tests. They have years of experience in their field and possess sound knowledge in their respective domain. Our team includes research & development associates, sales and marketing executives, technicians, engineers, quality supervisors and skilled and semi skilled workforce.

Clientele: M/s. Arab Emirates Bandag Co. L.L.C, Dubai, U.A.E M/s. P. T. Indo Bharath Rayon , Jakarta, Indonesia M/s. P. T. South Pacific Viscose, Jakarta, Indonesia M/s. Thai Rayon Public Co. Ltd., Bangkok, Thailand

Why Us?: Rigorous quality control Sound financial position Goodwill in the market Rigorous quality control Ability to meet bulk order consignments Wide spread distribution network
Experienced staff
